description: The file is a server-side entry point for a Remix application, handling HTTP requests by rendering React components to a stream and managing responses for browser and bot requests.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main export function that processes incoming HTTP requests, determines if the request is from a bot or browser, and delegates to appropriate handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering and streaming response specifically for bot user agents by rendering React components to a stream.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering and streaming response for browser user agents by rendering React components to a stream.
